oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Snow scene along Church Street, looking east towards Fifth Avenue, Nashville, Tennessee, 2016 January 22
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The snow-covered urban landscape along Church Street, Nashville, facing east towards Fifth Avenue, in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, January 22nd, 2016. This was the biggest snow in more than a decade to blanket Middle Tennessee with several inches of snow. Eight inches of snowfall was reported in Nashville, making it an historic weather event. Forms part of the Leanne Garland Photograph Collection. 1 digital photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Snow--Tennessee, Middle; Streets--Tennessee--Nashville; Central business districts--Tennessee--Nashville
